Fedora Wordpress

If you are on the search of a html/Wordpress theme with an excellent design and elaborated code that enables you to versatility customize and transform your website into a stunning landing page, there you will go with Fedora. Exclusively crafted on HTML5/CSS3 language, Fedora has no limitation in colors, styles and layouts that brings the whole world to your hand.

Highlight Features:


POWERFUL ADMIN PANEL

FRIENDLY SHORTCODE

INTUITIVE PAGE BUILDER

5-STAR DOCS & SUPPORT

EASY TO CUSTOMIZE

With user-friendly backend and extraordinary user experience, you will easily to customize the theme with no sweat.

See More

Unlimited Colors

You have the right to create whatever color scheme you like and apply to the layout of Fedora to create the best visual effect.

See More

WooCommerce-Supported Layout

Responsively Mobile Version

Concomitant PSD Files

Magazine Layout

Fedora brings to you two options with the news/magazine layout. All of them are perfectly befits your magazine/news section with the clean design that focuses on delivering the great reading experience for users while effectively attracts theme with the sensible combination of text and visual display

Magazine Style 1

Highlighted preview image will be displayed as the slider at the top of the page

More Details

Magazine Style 2

Featured or recent news will be displayed as a bunch with the hover effect.

More Details

Shopping Layout

As the rise of eCommerce website, Fedora would be considered as the greatest solution ever! It fully supports WooCommerce not only in the exclusive style but also in the system mechanism. Even the smallest details are taken care and design well like the promotion section, the page for shop or the category display. The fashionable flat and minimalism shop layout is applied flawlessly

Product Page

The product page shows a single product description, reviews, sharing option and more

More Details

Category Page

The product page shows a single product description, reviews, sharing option and more

More Details

And more layout homepage

  • Magazine Style

Don’t forget to rate the theme 5-star if you like it!

Fedora is the theme that innovatively uses the power of LESS and HTML5/CSS3 as the base. Besides the exclusive style and the compatibility with WooCommerce, it also has responsive layout, retina-ready, and rich-customizing options.
